title: Trading Platform: Investor Password Change (request)
description: Change the Trading Platform investor password

new_password.description: New investor password. Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address.

old_password.description: Old investor password for validation (non-empty string, accepts any printable ASCII character)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
